member.name: T:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip
member.summary: This class is the menu which will be shown when the right button of mouse is clicked.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.TopMostMenuItem
member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to set whether the FormMain is topmost.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.ExitMenuItem
member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to exit the program when it is clicked.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.OpacityMenuItem
member.summary: This is a memu item which is used to select the opacity of the FormMain.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.BackColorMenuItem
member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to choose the back color of the FormMain.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.ForeColorMenuItem
member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to choose the fore color of the FormMain.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FontSizeMenuItem
member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to choose the font size of the FormMain.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FontNameMenuItem
member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to choose the font name of the FormMain.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.MarginWidthMenuItem
member.summary: This is a menu item which is used to choose the margin width of the output PDF file.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.ColorList
member.summary: This is a string array to store the alternative color names.

member.summary: This is a event which will be triggered when "TopMostMenuItem" is clicked.

member.name: E:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.ExitMenuItem_Click
member.summary: This is a event which will be triggered when "ExitMenuItem" is clicked.

member.summary: This is a event which will be triggered when the sub item of "OpacityMenuItem" is clicked.
member.param: It is the sub item of "OpacityMenuItem".

member.name: E:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.BackColorMenuItem_Click
member.summary: This is a event which will be triggered when the sub item of "BackColorMenuItem" is clicked.
member.param: It is the sub item of "BackColorMenuItem".

member.name: E:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.ForeColorMenuItem_Click
member.summary: This is a event which will be triggered when the sub item of "ForeColorMenuItem" is clicked.
member.param: It is the sub item of "ForeColorMenuItem".

member.name: E:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FontSizeMenuItem_Click
member.summary: This is a event which will be triggered when the sub item of "FontSizeMenuItem" is clicked.
member.param: It is the sub item of "FontSizeMenuItem".

member.name: E:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FontNameMenuItem_Click
member.summary: This is a event which will be triggered when the sub item of "FontNameMenuItem" is clicked.
member.param: It is the sub item of "FontNameMenuItem".

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainTopMost
member.summary: This is a writeonly boolean to represent whether the FormMain is topmost. When it is assigned a value, its checked state is changed. Then raise the event "TopMostMenuItem_Click".

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainOpacity
member.summary: This is a writeonly double to represent the opacity of the FormMain. When it is assigned a value, checked states of the corresponding sub items are changed. Then raise the event "OpacityMenuItem_Click".

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainBackColor
member.summary: This is a writeonly color to represent the back color of the FormMain. When it is assigned a value, the image of this item will be assigned the image of its sub item, whose color is equal to the value. Then raise the event "BackColorMenuItem_Click".

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.FormMainForeColor
member.summary: This is a writeonly color to represent the fore color of the FormMain. When it is assigned a value, the image of this item will be assigned the image of its sub item, whose color is equal to the value. Then raise the event "ForeColorMenuItem_Click".

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.#ctor
member.summary: This is the constructor of this class.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.GetImageByColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: This function is used to generate a colored image by the paramter color.
member.param: This is the color of the image.
member.returns: This is an image whose color is equal to the parameter "Color".

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.ContextMenuStrip.Me_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the items of the menu is clicked, this sub will be triggered.
member.param: This is the sender of the event.
This is the arguments of the event.

member.name: T:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.TransparentPanel
member.summary: This class is a panel which is tansparent. This class is used to cover the other control, which should be click by mouse.

member.name: P:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.TransparentPanel.CreateParams
member.summary: CreateParams is a property of Control object. CreateParams is used to gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created. In this class, we override the property CreateParams, and set the ExStyle = ExStyle Or 0x20 to make the background is trasparent.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.PDFCropper.TransparentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: We override the sub OnPaintBackground to prevent the background of this panel from being painted.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.RichTextBox
member.summary: This RichTextBox is used to show the message of the software.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.TransparentPanel
member.summary: This TransparentPanel is used to prevent the RichTextBox from being clicked by mouse.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.ContextMenuStrip
member.summary: This ContextMenuStrip is shown when the right mouse button is clicked.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.MouseDownLocation
member.summary: This Point is used to record the location where mouse button is pressed down.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.FormLastLocation
member.summary: This Point is used to record the last location of the FormMain.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.Configuration
member.summary: This Configuration is used to read and to save the configuration of the software.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.ConfigurationPath
member.summary: This constant string is used to save the configuration file path.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.GhostScriptBinFolder
member.summary: This variable string is used to save the bin folder path of the GhostScript.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.PDFFilePool
member.summary: This ArrayList is the pool of PDF files which will be cropped by this software. If the PDF file in this pool has been cropped by this software, it will be removed from this pool.

member.name: F:PDFCropper.FormMain.CropPDFThread
member.summary: This Thread is used to crop the PDF files which are in the "PDFFilePool".

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.IsGhostScripBinFolder(System.String)
member.summary: This function is used to judge whether the Path is the bin folder of the GhostScript.
member.returns: If the Path is the bin folder of the GhostScript, return true, else return false.

member.summary: This sub is triggered when something are dragged into the TransparentPanel.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.CropPDF
member.summary: This sub is used to crop the PDF files which are in the "PDFFilePool".

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.GetPDFRectangles(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function is used to get the rectangle list from the output string of the GhostScript.
member.param: The output string of the GhostScript.
The width of margin which you want to keep.
member.returns: The return is an ArrayList. Assuming that there are N pages in the PDF file, the length of the ArrayList is N.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.GetPDFRectangle(System.String)
member.summary: This function is used to get the rectangle from the BoundingBox string. For example, the BoundingBox string is "0 0 100 100", this function will return a new rectangle with these for parameters.

member.name: M:PDFCropper.FormMain.GetPDFRectangle(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function is used to get the rectangle from the BoundingBox string.
member.param: The width of margin which you want to keep.
